hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Sorry, I'm busy at the moment medicross.co.za It was coming up to Valentine's Day, and they had a poster up extolling their “romantic package,” that said something like: “Â£50 gets you a candlelit dinner for two, with complementary half-bottle of champagne (not to be taken into the main bar area).” We had a camcorder, and Steve was doing a conducted tour of the place as Alan. We got outside on the forecourt, with the wind howling and the cars roaring by, and he turned to camera and said: “Yes, it's got everything, but I have to admit, I don't want to die here.” That's when it struck us that there was some depth to this situation – a kind of social X-ray of male middle-aged Middle England – that we could explore.
